dt-api.name: state.loaded()
dt-api.summary: Get the table state that was loaded during initialisation.

type.description: Get the table state that was loaded during initialisation
type.returns: State saved object. See `dt-api state()` for the object format.

dt-api.description:
This method is primarily made available for plug-in authors who wish to get the state of a DataTable when it is initialised to restore state saved functionality of their own plug-in.
The structure of the object returned by this method matches the state object, as defined by `dt-api state()`.

example.title: Listen for DataTables initialisation and get the state
